original_text: Judah's army then attacked Jerusalem. They took the city for themselves. They killed the people who lived there and they burnt down the buildings.
korean_text: 유다 자손이 예루살렘을 쳐서 점령하여 칼날로 치고 그 성을 불살랐으며

sentences.original_text: They took the city for themselves.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 성을 자신들을 위해 점령했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They killed the people who lived there
and they burnt down the buildings.
